name: ecommerce-d-choco-front
description: Frontend da loja D'Choco - Chocolates Artesanais

scripts.purge-css: purgecss --css assets/css/main.css assets/css/icone.css assets/css/carrinho.css assets/css/mobile-nav.css assets/css/slider.css assets/css/pwa.css --content '*.html' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/css/
scripts.purge-css:full: purgecss --css assets/css/*.css main.css --content '*.html' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/css/ && rm main.css
scripts.optimize: npm run purge-css && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-css: for file in assets/css/*.css; do npx cssnano "$file" --output "$file"; done

author: Diego Moraes
